102//
103//*****************************************************************************
104typedef enum
105{
106 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_DIS = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_DIS,
107 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_YR = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_YEAR,
108 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_MTH = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_MONTH,
109 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_WK = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_WEEK,
110 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_DAY = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_DAY,
111 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_HR = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_HR,
112 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_MIN = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_MIN,
113 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_SEC = RTC_RTCCTL_RPT_SEC,
114 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_10TH,
115 AM_HAL_RTC_ALM_RPT_100TH,
116}
117am_hal_rtc_alarm_repeat_e;
